data.title: Knowledge Management
data.description: Knowledge Management introduces fundamental concept of knowledge and different l issues in managing the knowledge. This course enables to learn about the Evolution of Knowledge management, be familiar with tools, be exposed to applications, and be familiar with some case studies.

content: Knowledge Management introduces fundamental concept of knowledge and different l issues in managing the knowledge. This course enables to learn about the Evolution of Knowledge management, be familiar with tools, be exposed to applications, and be familiar with some case studies.
